00068 int LineNumberWidget::LineNumberAreaWidth() const
00069 {
00070         int digits = 1;
00071         int max = qMax(1, m_codeEditArea->blockCount() );
00072         while (max >= 10)
00073         {
00074                 max /= 10;
00075                 ++digits;
00076         }
00077 
00078         int space = 3 + fontMetrics().width(QLatin1Char('9')) * digits;
00079 
00080         return space;
00081 }

00083 void LineNumberWidget::UpdateLineNumberArea( const QRect& rect, int dy )
00084 {
00085         if( dy )        scroll( 0, dy );
00086         else    update( 0, rect.y(), width(), rect.height() );
00087 
00088         QWidget* viewport = m_codeEditArea->viewport();
00089         viewport->setContentsMargins( LineNumberAreaWidth(), 0, 0, 0 );
00090 
00091 }

00093 void  LineNumberWidget::paintEvent( QPaintEvent *event )
00094 {
00095         QPainter painter( this );
00096         painter.fillRect(event->rect(), Qt::lightGray);
00097 
00098         QTextBlock block = m_codeEditArea->document()->begin();
00099         int blockNumber = block.blockNumber();
00100 
00101         int top = m_codeEditArea->BlockTop( block );
00102         int bottom = top + m_codeEditArea->BlockHeight(block);
00103 
00104         while( block.isValid() && top <= ( event->rect().bottom() ) )
00105         {
00106                 if( block.isVisible() && ( bottom >= event->rect().top() ) )
00107                 {
00108                         QString number = QString::number( blockNumber + 1 );
00109                         painter.setPen(Qt::black);
00110                         painter.drawText( 0, top,width(), fontMetrics().height(), Qt::AlignRight, number);
00111                 }
00112 
00113                 block = block.next();
00114                 top = bottom;
00115                 bottom = top + m_codeEditArea->BlockHeight(block);
00116                 ++blockNumber;
00117         }
00118 }
